description:
For simplicity, the sample comes loaded with a start and end stop. You can tap on the route button to get a route between these stops. Once the route is generated, the directions button gets enabled. Tap on the button to see the step by step directions for the route.

The sample uses theÂ generateDefaultParametersÂ method onÂ RouteTaskÂ to get the default parameters from the service. Next, the stops are set in those parameters and returnDirections is set to true. Then, theÂ solveRoutemethod is used to solve for the route. Once the route has been solved, the sample displays the route as aÂ Graphic, and theÂ directionManeuversÂ are given to a ListView.

snippet: This sample demonstrates how to get a route between two locations.
title: Find a Route
